ARC Timer Interrupt Example¶

Overview¶

This example is designed to show how to use DesignWare® ARC® processors internal timers and timer interrupt.

Detailed Description¶

  • Extra Required Tools

    NO

  • Extra Required Peripherals

    NO

  • Design Concept

    This example is designed to show how to use ARC timer and interrupt. During initialization, the timer 0 and timer 1 are enabled and interrupt is configured. The timer 0 Interrupt Service Routine (ISR) is set as Fast Interrupt Request Queue (FIQ) using int_pri_set(). The timer 0 interrupt is responsed with the highest priority.

Note

Hardware support: all DesignWare® ARC® processors based platform with internal timers configured

Buidling and Running¶

Taking EM Starter Kit as exmaple, the commands to run this example are as follows:

$ cd <embarc_root>/example/baremetal/arc_feature/timer_interrupt
$ make BOARD=emsk BD_VER=22 CUR_CORE=arcem7d TOOLCHAIN=gnu run

Note

Make sure you have selected the correct configuration of EM Starter Kit via dip switches and that you have reset the board (button above “R”).

Sample Output¶

If you are using the nSIM, you will see the following outputs in the CMD window when download is successful.

-----------------------------------------------------------
 ____                                _ ____
|  _ \ _____      _____ _ __ ___  __| | __ ) _   _
| |_) / _ \ \ /\ / / _ \ '__/ _ \/ _` |  _ \| | | |
|  __/ (_) \ V  V /  __/ | |  __/ (_| | |_) | |_| |
|_|   \___/ \_/\_/ \___|_|  \___|\__,_|____/ \__, |
                                             |___/
                     _       _    ____   ____
       ___ _ __ ___ | |__   / \  |  _ \ / ___|
      / _ \ '_ ` _ \| '_ \ / _ \ | |_) | |
     |  __/ | | | | | |_) / ___ \|  _ <| |___
      \___|_| |_| |_|_.__/_/   \_\_| \_\\____|
------------------------------------------------------------

embARC Build Time: Mar 16 2018, 09:58:46
Compiler Version: Metaware, 4.2.1 Compatible Clang 4.0.1 (branches/release_40)
ARC timer and interrupt
interrupt number:8, extern interrupts:6, interrupt priorities:16, fiq enabled
timer 0 is present
cnt:2719
timer 1 is present
cnt:106634
timer0 interrupt with the highest priority(fiq if fiq enabled):1
timer0 interrupt with the highest priority(fiq if fiq enabled):2
stop timer0, cnt:20
timer1 interrupt:1
timer1 interrupt:2
stop timer1, cnt:19
enable timer 0 watchdog
---end----

If you are using the EM Starter Kit, you will see the same msg through UART

Note

Make sure you have chosen correct COM port and set the baud rate to 115200 before you start.
